# acceptsFirstResponder

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the text field is editable and accepts first responder status.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var acceptsFirstResponder: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the text field is editable and can become the first responder; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: acceptsFirstResponder
